amendment.description: Senate amendment added a new title at the end of the bill entitled "Trade Adjustment Assistance" and appears on page H6771 of the Congressional Record of October 11, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to insert language in the legislation stating that the compliance date be not later than 3 years.

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 262 (Roll no. 779).
